<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="pt-BR"><head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no">
<title>DANGER GG - Recrutamento</title>
<meta name="description" content="Fa√ßa parte da fam√≠lia DANGER GG! Recrutamento oficial para a guilda de Free Fire.">
<style>
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700;800;900&display=swap');
* { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }
body { font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; background: #000; color: #fff; min-height: 100vh; min-height: 100dvh; }
.container { width: 100%; min-height: 100vh; min-height: 100dvh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; overflow: hidden; }
.header { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; padding: 14px 16px; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); flex-shrink: 0; }
.header-back { background: none; border: none; color: #fff; cursor: pointer; padding: 4px; flex-shrink: 0; }
.header-avatar { width: 40px; height: 40px; border-radius: 50%; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #833ab4, #fd1d1d, #fcb045); padding: 2px; position: relative; flex-shrink: 0; }
.header-avatar img { width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; }
.header-online { position: absolute; bottom: 0; right: 0; width: 12px; height: 12px; background: #22c55e; border-radius: 50%; border: 2px solid #000; }
.header-info { flex: 1; min-width: 0; }
.header-name { font-weight: 600; font-size: 16px; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; }
.header-status { font-size: 13px; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5); }
.header-icons { display: flex; gap: 16px; flex-shrink: 0; }
.header-icons svg { width: 26px; height: 26px; }
.messages { flex: 1; overflow-y: auto; overflow-x: hidden; padding: 16px; }
.profile-card { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; padding: 20px 0; margin-bottom: 16px; }
.profile-avatar { width: 100px; height: 100px; border-radius: 50%; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #833ab4, #fd1d1d, #fcb045); padding: 3px; margin-bottom: 12px; }
.profile-avatar img { width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; }
.profile-name { font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; }
.profile-subtitle { font-size: 13px; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5); margin-top: 4px; }
.profile-stats { font-size: 13px; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.4); margin-top: 6px; }
.profile-btn { margin-top: 12px; padding: 8px 20px; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 600; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); color: #fff; border: none; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; }
.profile-follow { font-size: 13px; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.3); margin-top: 16px; text-align: center; }
.message { margin-bottom: 10px; display: flex; animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease; }
.message.bot { justify-content: flex-start; }
.message.user { justify-content: flex-end; }
.message-bubble { max-width: 80%; padding: 12px 18px; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5; }
.message.bot .message-bubble { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); border-radius: 18px 18px 18px 4px; }
.message.user .message-bubble { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6, #9333ea); border-radius: 18px 18px 4px 18px; }
.typing { display: flex; gap: 5px; padding: 14px 18px; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); border-radius: 18px 18px 18px 4px; width: fit-content; }
.typing span { width: 10px; height: 10px; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.5); border-radius: 50%; animation: bounce 1.4s infinite; }
.typing span:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.typing span:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
.requirements { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); border-radius: 20px; padding: 20px; margin: 16px 0; }
.requirements h3 { text-align: center; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 20px; font-size: 16px; }
.req-item { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 14px; margin-bottom: 14px; cursor: pointer; }
.req-checkbox { width: 24px; height: 24px; border: 2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3); border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; transition: all 0.2s; flex-shrink: 0; }
.req-checkbox.checked { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a855f7, #ec4899); border-color: transparent; }
.req-checkbox svg { width: 14px; height: 14px; display: none; }
.req-checkbox.checked svg { display: block; }
.req-label { font-size: 15px; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9); }
.progress-bar { height: 8px; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 20px; overflow: hidden; }
.progress-fill { height: 100%; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #a855f7, #ec4899); transition: width 0.3s; }
.progress-text { text-align: center; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.4); margin-top: 10px; }
.req-btn { width: 100%; margin-top: 20px; padding: 16px; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; border: none; border-radius: 14px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s; }
.req-btn:disabled { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); color: rgba(255,255,255,0.3); cursor: not-allowed; }
.req-btn:not(:disabled) { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #a855f7, #ec4899); color: #fff; }
.admin-card { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05); border:2px solid #25D366; border-radius:16px; padding:14px; display:flex; align-items:center; gap:14px; width:100%; box-sizing:border-box; transition:.2s; flex-direction: column; }
.admin-card:hover { border-color: #1ebe5d; background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05); }
.admin-avatar { width: 56px; height: 56px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; flex-shrink: 0; }
.admin-info { flex: 1; min-width: 0; }
.admin-name { font-weight: 600; font-size: 16px; }
.admin-role { font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5); }
.admin-phone { font-size: 14px; color: #22c55e; }
.admin-wa { width: 44px; height: 44px; background: #22c55e; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; flex-shrink: 0; }
.admin-wa svg { width: 24px; height: 24px; }
.input-area { padding: 14px 16px; border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); flex-shrink: 0; }
.input-row { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; }
.input-field { flex: 1; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2); border-radius: 28px; padding: 12px 18px; }
.input-field input { flex: 1; background: none; border: none; color: #fff; font-size: 16px; outline: none; min-width: 0; }
.input-field input::placeholder { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.4); }
.send-btn { color: #3b82f6; font-weight: 600; font-size: 16px; background: none; border: none; cursor: pointer; flex-shrink: 0; }
.backup-btn { margin-top: 12px; width: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 8px; padding: 12px; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5); background: none; border: none; border-radius: 10px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s; }
.backup-btn:hover { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05); color: rgba(255,255,255,0.8); }
.confirm-card { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); border-radius: 16px; padding: 20px; margin: 16px 0; }
.confirm-title { text-align: center; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 16px; font-size: 16px; color: #a855f7; }
.confirm-item { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; padding: 12px 0; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05); }
.confirm-item:last-child { border-bottom: none; }
.confirm-label { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6); font-size: 14px; }
.confirm-value { color: #fff; font-weight: 600; font-size: 15px; }
.confirm-buttons { display: flex; gap: 10px; margin-top: 16px; }
.confirm-btn { flex: 1; padding: 14px; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 600; border: none; border-radius: 12px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s; }
.confirm-btn.yes { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #22c55e, #16a34a); color: #fff; }
.confirm-btn.no { background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.2); color: #ef4444; border: 1px solid #ef4444; }
.loading-spinner { display: inline-block; width: 16px; height: 16px; border: 2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3); border-top-color: #fff; border-radius: 50%; animation: spin 0.8s linear infinite; margin-left: 8px; }
@keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
@keyframes bounce { 0%, 60%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); } 30% { transform: translateY(-5px); } }
@keyframes spin { to { transform: rotate(360deg); } }
</style>
<style id="htmlEditorProStyle">#htmlEditorPro{position:fixed;top:30px;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);width:95vw;max-width:420px;height:70vh;max-height:90vh;background:#222;color:#fff;z-index:999999;box-shadow:0 0 18px #0009;display:flex;flex-direction:column;font-family:'Fira Mono','Consolas','monospace';border-radius:12px;}#htmlEditorProBar{background:#333;padding:12px;cursor:move;display:flex;align-items:center;gap:10px;border-bottom:2px solid #fff;font-size:18px;user-select:none;border-top-left-radius:12px;border-top-right-radius:12px;}#htmlEditorProBar b{color:#fff;font-weight:bold;font-size:18px;letter-spacing:1px;font-family:inherit;}#htmlEditorProBtns{display:flex;gap:8px;margin-left:auto;}#htmlEditorProBtns button{padding:7px 10px;border:none;border-radius:7px;font-size:16px;font-weight:bold;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:0 2px 8px #0004;outline:none;}#htmlEditorProBtnRun{background:#0a0;color:#fff;}#htmlEditorProBtnSave{background:#06c;color:#fff;}#htmlEditorProBtnEdit{background:#f8d703;color:#222;}#htmlEditorProBtnClose{background:#c00;color:#fff;}#htmlEditorProBtnEnd{background:#444;color:#fff;}#htmlEditorPro textarea{flex:1;padding:10px;background:#222;color:#fff;font-family:inherit;font-size:14px;resize:none;border:none;outline:none;width:100%;height:100%;line-height:1.5;overflow:auto;border-bottom-left-radius:12px;border-bottom-right-radius:12px;}@media(max-width:600px){#htmlEditorPro{width:98vw;max-width:98vw;height:90vh;}#htmlEditorProBar{font-size:16px;padding:8px;}#htmlEditorProBtns button{font-size:15px;padding:6px 6px;}#htmlEditorPro textarea{font-size:12px;padding:6px;}}</style></head>
<body>

      <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"><path d="M22 16.92v3a2 2 0 01-2.18 2 19.79 19.79 0 01-8.63-3.07 19.5 19.5 0 01-6-6 19.79 19.79 0 01-3.07-8.67A2 2 0 014.11 2h3a2 2 0 012 1.72 12.84 12.84 0 00.7 2.81 2 2 0 01-.45 2.11L8.09 9.91a16 16 0 006 6l1.27-1.27a2 2 0 012.11-.45 12.84 12.84 0 002.81.7A2 2 0 0122 16.92z"></path></svg>
      <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"><path d="M23 7l-7 5 7 5V7zM14 5H3a2 2 0 00-2 2v10a2 2 0 002 2h11a2 2 0 002-2V7a2 2 0 00-2-2z"></path></svg>

<script>
const ADMINS = [
  { name: "LIDER DRAK", role: "L√≠der", phone: "+55 88 98169-2260", whatsapp: "5588981692260", image: "adm1.png" },
  { name: "LIDER KABULOSA", role: "L√≠der", phone: "+55 85 9212-5491", whatsapp: "558592125491", image: "adm2.png" },
  { name: "ADM ELVIS", role: "Administrador", phone: "+55 83 99167-2088", whatsapp: "5583991672088", image: "adm3.png" }
];
const REQUIREMENTS = ["150 Pontos na Guerra de Guildas","3.000 Pontos semanais","Participa√ß√£o em xTreino/Eventos","Ter compromisso","Respeito & Disciplina","Discord ativo","WhatsApp ativo","Jogar GG regularmente"];
let phase = 'greeting', formData = {}, checkedItems = new Array(8).fill(false);
let playerData = null;

function addMessage(text, isBot, type = 'text') {
  const container = document.getElementById('messages');
  const div = document.createElement('div');
  div.className = 'message ' + (isBot ? 'bot' : 'user');
  
  if (type === 'requirements') {
    div.innerHTML = `<div class="requirements"><h3>üî• Requisitos da DANGER GG¬π üî•</h3>${REQUIREMENTS.map((r,i) => `<label class="req-item" onclick="toggleReq(${i})"><div class="req-checkbox" id="check${i}"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="3"><path d="M5 13l4 4L19 7"/></svg></div><span class="req-label">‚öîÔ∏è ${r}</span></label>`).join('')}<div class="progress-bar"><div class="progress-fill" id="progressFill" style="width:0%"></div></div><p class="progress-text" id="progressText">0/8 requisitos</p><button class="req-btn" id="reqBtn" disabled onclick="confirmReq()">Marque todos os requisitos</button></div>`;
  } else if (type === 'funcao') {
    const FUNCOES = [
      { key: 'RUSH',       label: 'RUSH',       img: 'data:image/png;base64,',  border: '#ef4444', glow: 'rgba(239,68,68,0.25)' },
      { key: 'CURANDEIRO', label: 'CURANDEIRO', img: 'data:image/png;base64,',   border: '#22c55e', glow: 'rgba(34,197,94,0.25)'  },
      { key: 'FULL GAS',   label: 'FULL G√ÅS',   img: 'data:image/png;base64,',  border: '#f59e0b', glow: 'rgba(245,158,11,0.25)' }
    ];
    div.innerHTML = `<div class="message-bubble" style="max-width:100%;padding:0;background:transparent;">
      <div class="requirements" style="padding:16px;">
        <h3 style="margin-bottom:6px;">‚öîÔ∏è Sua Fun√ß√£o na Guerra de Guildas</h3>
        <p style="text-align:center;font-size:13px;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.4);margin-bottom:16px;">Escolha como voc√™ joga na GdG</p>
        ${FUNCOES.map(f => `
        <div onclick="selectFuncao('${f.key}')" style="display:flex;align-items:center;gap:14px;background:rgba(255,255,255,0.04);border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);border-radius:14px;padding:12px 16px;margin-bottom:10px;cursor:pointer;transition:all .25s;"
          onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='${f.border}';this.style.boxShadow='0 0 14px ${f.glow}'"
          onmouseout="this.style.borderColor='rgba(255,255,255,0.1)';this.style.boxShadow='none'">
          <img src="${f.img}" style="width:48px;height:48px;object-fit:contain;flex-shrink:0;filter:drop-shadow(0 0 8px ${f.glow})">
          <div style="flex:1">
            <div style="font-size:17px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:.04em">${f.label}</div>
          </div>
          <svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="rgba(255,255,255,0.3)" stroke-width="2"><path d="M9 18l6-6-6-6"/></svg>
        </div>`).join('')}
      </div>
    </div>`;
  } else if (type === 'pontuacao') {
    const OPCOES = [
      { label: '50 ‚Äì 100 pts',    sub: 'Iniciante',       color: '#94a3b8' },
      { label: '100 ‚Äì 150 pts',    sub: 'Regular',         color: '#22c55e' },
      { label: '200 ‚Äì 300 pts',    sub: 'Bom',             color: '#3b82f6' },
      { label: '400 ‚Äì 500 pts',    sub: '√ìtimo',           color: '#a855f7' },
      { label: '500+ pts',         sub: 'Elite üî•',        color: '#f59e0b' },
      { label: 'Nunca joguei GdG', sub: 'Sem experi√™ncia', color: '#6b7280' }
    ];
    div.innerHTML = `<div class="message-bubble" style="max-width:100%;padding:0;background:transparent;">
      <div class="requirements" style="padding:16px;">
        <h3 style="margin-bottom:6px;">üèÜ M√≠nimos Pontos na GdG</h3>
        <p style="text-align:center;font-size:13px;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.4);margin-bottom:16px;">Quantos pontos voc√™ costuma fazer na Guerra de Guildas?</p>
        ${OPCOES.map(o => `
        <div onclick="selectPontuacao('${o.label}')" style="display:flex;align-items:center;gap:12px;background:rgba(255,255,255,0.04);border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);border-radius:12px;padding:11px 14px;margin-bottom:8px;cursor:pointer;transition:all .2s;"
          onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='${o.color}';this.style.background='rgba(255,255,255,0.07)'"
          onmouseout="this.style.borderColor='rgba(255,255,255,0.1)';this.style.background='rgba(255,255,255,0.04)'">
          <div style="width:10px;height:10px;border-radius:50%;background:${o.color};flex-shrink:0;box-shadow:0 0 8px ${o.color}"></div>
          <div style="flex:1">
            <div style="font-size:15px;font-weight:700">${o.label}</div>
            <div style="font-size:12px;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.4);margin-top:2px">${o.sub}</div>
          </div>
          <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="rgba(255,255,255,0.3)" stroke-width="2"><path d="M9 18l6-6-6-6"/></svg>
        </div>`).join('')}
      </div>
    </div>`;
  } else if (type === 'admins') {
    div.innerHTML = ADMINS.map(a => `<div class="admin-card" onclick="sendToAdmin('${a.whatsapp}','${a.name}')"><img class="admin-avatar" src="${a.image}" alt="${a.name}"><div class="admin-info"><div class="admin-name">${a.name}</div><div class="admin-role">${a.role}</div><div class="admin-phone">${a.phone}</div></div><div class="admin-wa"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="#fff"><path d="M17.472 14.382c-.297-.149-1.758-.867-2.03-.967-.273-.099-.471-.148-.67.15-.197.297-.767.966-.94 1.164-.173.199-.347.223-.644.075-.297-.15-1.255-.463-2.39-1.475-.883-.788-1.48-1.761-1.653-2.059-.173-.297-.018-.458.13-.606.134-.133.298-.347.446-.52.149-.174.198-.298.298-.497.099-.198.05-.371-.025-.52-.075-.149-.669-1.612-.916-2.207-.242-.579-.487-.5-.669-.51-.173-.008-.371-.01-.57-.01-.198 0-.52.074-.792.372-.272.297-1.04 1.016-1.04 2.479 0 1.462 1.065 2.875 1.213 3.074.149.198 2.096 3.2 5.077 4.487.709.306 1.262.489 1.694.625.712.227 1.36.195 1.871.118.571-.085 1.758-.719 2.006-1.413.248-.694.248-1.289.173-1.413-.074-.124-.272-.198-.57-.347m-5.421 7.403h-.004a9.87 9.87 0 01-5.031-1.378l-.361-.214-3.741.982.998-3.648-.235-.374a9.86 9.86 0 01-1.51-5.26c.001-5.45 4.436-9.884 9.888-9.884 2.64 0 5.122 1.03 6.988 2.898a9.825 9.825 0 012.893 6.994c-.003 5.45-4.437 9.884-9.885 9.884m8.413-18.297A11.815 11.815 0 0012.05 0C5.495 0 .16 5.335.157 11.892c0 2.096.547 4.142 1.588 5.945L.057 24l6.305-1.654a11.882 11.882 0 005.683 1.448h.005c6.554 0 11.89-5.335 11.893-11.893a11.821 11.821 0 00-3.48-8.413z"/></svg></div></div>`).join('');
  } else if (type === 'confirm') {
    div.innerHTML = '<div class="message-bubble" style="max-width: 100%; padding: 0; background: transparent;"><div class="confirm-card"><div class="confirm-title">üéÆ Confirme seus dados</div><div class="confirm-item"><div class="confirm-label">Nickname:</div><div class="confirm-value">' + text.nick + '</div></div><div class="confirm-item"><div class="confirm-label">ID:</div><div class="confirm-value">' + text.id + '</div></div><div class="confirm-item"><div class="confirm-label">Level:</div><div class="confirm-value">' + text.level + '</div></div><div class="confirm-buttons"><button class="confirm-btn yes" onclick="confirmPlayerData(true)">‚úì Est√° correto</button><button class="confirm-btn no" onclick="confirmPlayerData(false)">‚úó Est√° errado</button></div></div></div>';
  } else {
    div.innerHTML = `<div class="message-bubble">${text}</div>`;
  }
  
  container.appendChild(div);
  container.scrollTop = container.scrollHeight;
}

function showTyping() {
  const container = document.getElementById('messages');
  const div = document.createElement('div');
  div.id = 'typing';
  div.className = 'message bot';
  div.innerHTML = '<div class="typing"><span></span><span></span><span></span></div>';
  container.appendChild(div);
  container.scrollTop = container.scrollHeight;
}

function hideTyping() { document.getElementById('typing')?.remove(); }

function botMessage(text, type = 'text', delay = 1200) {
  showTyping();
  setTimeout(() => { hideTyping(); addMessage(text, true, type); }, delay);
}

function toggleReq(i) {
  checkedItems[i] = !checkedItems[i];
  const el = document.getElementById('check' + i);
  el.classList.toggle('checked', checkedItems[i]);
  const count = checkedItems.filter(Boolean).length;
  document.getElementById('progressFill').style.width = (count/8*100) + '%';
  document.getElementById('progressText').textContent = count + '/8 requisitos';
  const btn = document.getElementById('reqBtn');
  btn.disabled = count < 8;
  btn.textContent = count === 8 ? 'Confirmar ‚úì' : 'Marque todos os requisitos';
}

function confirmReq() {
  addMessage('Pronto! Marquei tudo ‚úÖ', false);
  setTimeout(() => {
    botMessage('Show demais! Voc√™ atende todos os requisitos! üéâ', 'text', 1000);

}

function enableInput(placeholder) {
  const input = document.getElementById('userInput');
  input.disabled = false;
  input.placeholder = placeholder;
  input.focus();
}

async function fetchPlayerData(id) {
  try {
    const response = await fetch('https://elvis-ff-info.vercel.app/?id=' + id);
    const data = await response.json();
    
    if (data.success && data.data && data.data.perfil) {
      return {
        success: true,
        nickname: data.data.perfil.nickname,
        id: data.data.perfil.id,
        level: data.data.perfil.nivel
      };
    }
    return { success: false };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Erro ao buscar dados:', error);
    return { success: false };
  }
}

function confirmPlayerData(confirmed) {
  if (confirmed) {
    addMessage('Sim, est√° correto! ‚úÖ', false);
    formData.nick = playerData.nickname;
    setTimeout(() => {
      botMessage('Perfeito! Nick confirmado: ' + playerData.nickname + ' üî•', 'text', 800);
      setTimeout(() => {
        botMessage('Por √∫ltimo, seu WhatsApp? üì±', 'text', 1400);
        setTimeout(() => { phase = 'contato'; enableInput('Ex: (85) 99999-9999'); }, 1600);
      }, 1000);
    }, 500);
  } else {
    addMessage('N√£o, est√° errado ‚úó', false);
    playerData = null;
    setTimeout(() => {
      botMessage('Sem problemas! Vamos tentar de novo. Me passa o ID correto do Free Fire:', 'text', 1000);
      setTimeout(() => { phase = 'idGame'; enableInput('Digite seu ID...'); }, 1200);
    }, 500);
  }
}

async function sendMessage() {
  const input = document.getElementById('userInput');
  const value = input.value.trim();
  if (!value) return;
  
  if (phase === 'idade' && (isNaN(parseInt(value)) || parseInt(value) < 1)) {
    addMessage(value, false);
    setTimeout(() => botMessage('Eita, a idade m√≠nima √©  anos! Me passa sua idade certinha üòÖ', 'text', 800), 300);
    input.value = '';
    return;
  }
  
  addMessage(value, false);
  input.value = '';
  input.disabled = true;
  
  if (phase === 'idGame') {
    botMessage('Consultando seu ID... <span class="loading-spinner"></span>', 'text', 500);
    
    const data = await fetchPlayerData(value);
    
    setTimeout(() => {
      hideTyping();
      
      if (data.success) {
        playerData = data;
        formData.idGame = value;
        
        botMessage('ID encontrado! üéÆ', 'text', 800);
        setTimeout(() => {
          botMessage('Verifique se os dados est√£o corretos:', 'text', 1000);
          setTimeout(() => {
            addMessage({
              nick: data.nickname,
              id: data.id,
              level: data.level
            }, true, 'confirm');
            phase = 'waiting_confirm';
          }, 1200);
        }, 1000);
      } else {
        botMessage('Ops! N√£o consegui encontrar esse ID. Tem certeza que digitou certo? ü§î', 'text', 1000);
        setTimeout(() => {
          botMessage('Tenta de novo, por favor:', 'text', 1200);
          setTimeout(() => { phase = 'idGame'; enableInput('Digite seu ID...'); }, 1400);
        }, 1400);
      }
    }, 1500);
    
    return;
  }
  
  formData[phase] = value;
  
  const flows = {
    nome: () => { botMessage('Prazer, ' + value + '! Nome bonito! üòÑ', 'text', 800); setTimeout(() => { botMessage('Quantos anos voc√™ tem?', 'text', 1200); setTimeout(() => { phase = 'idade'; enableInput('Digite sua idade...'); }, 1400); }, 1000); },
    idade: () => { botMessage('Perfeito! Idade boa! üëç', 'text', 800); setTimeout(() => { botMessage('E qual √© seu ID do Free Fire?', 'text', 1200); setTimeout(() => { phase = 'idGame'; enableInput('Digite seu ID...'); }, 1400); }, 1000); },
    contato: () => { botMessage('Maravilha! Anotei tudo! üìù', 'text', 800); setTimeout(() => { botMessage('Agora me diz: qual √© sua fun√ß√£o na Guerra de Guildas? ‚öîÔ∏è', 'text', 1300); setTimeout(() => { addMessage('', true, 'funcao'); phase = 'funcao'; }, 1500); }, 1000); }
  };
  
  setTimeout(() => flows[phase]?.(), 400);
}
